segment.source: Managing Application-Compatibility Fixes and Custom Fix Databases (Windows 10)
segment.target: Managing Application-Compatibility Fixes and Custom Fix Databases (Windows 10)

segment.source: This section provides information about managing your application-compatibility fixes and custom-compatibility fix databases.
segment.target: This section provides information about managing your application-compatibility fixes and custom-compatibility fix databases.

segment.source: This section explains the reasons for using compatibility fixes and how to deploy custom-compatibility fix databases.
segment.target: This section explains the reasons for using compatibility fixes and how to deploy custom-compatibility fix databases.

segment.source: Managing Application-Compatibility Fixes and Custom Fix Databases
segment.target: Managing Application-Compatibility Fixes and Custom Fix Databases

segment.source: This section provides information about managing your application-compatibility fixes and custom-compatibility fix databases.
segment.target: This section provides information about managing your application-compatibility fixes and custom-compatibility fix databases.

segment.source: This section explains the reasons for using compatibility fixes and how to deploy custom-compatibility fix databases.
segment.target: This section explains the reasons for using compatibility fixes and how to deploy custom-compatibility fix databases.

segment.source: As the Windows operating system evolves to support new technology and functionality, the implementations of some functions may change.
segment.target: As the Windows operating system evolves to support new technology and functionality, the implementations of some functions may change.

segment.source: This can cause problems for applications that relied upon the original implementation.
segment.target: This can cause problems for applications that relied upon the original implementation.

segment.source: You can avoid compatibility issues by using the Microsoft Windows Application Compatibility (Compatibility Fix) infrastructure to create a specific application fix for a particular version of an application.
segment.target: You can avoid compatibility issues by using the Microsoft Windows Application Compatibility (Compatibility Fix) infrastructure to create a specific application fix for a particular version of an application.

segment.source: Compatibility Fix Database Management Strategies and Deployment
segment.target: Compatibility Fix Database Management Strategies and Deployment

segment.source: After you determine that you will use compatibility fixes in your application-compatibility mitigation strategy, you must define a strategy to manage your custom compatibility-fix database.
segment.target: After you determine that you will use compatibility fixes in your application-compatibility mitigation strategy, you must define a strategy to manage your custom compatibility-fix database.

segment.source: Typically, you can use one of two approaches:
segment.target: Typically, you can use one of two approaches:

segment.source: This topic provides details about testing your application-mitigation packages, including recommendations about how to report your information and how to resolve any outstanding issues.
segment.target: This topic provides details about testing your application-mitigation packages, including recommendations about how to report your information and how to resolve any outstanding issues.
